messages.body:
has graced these pages many times, most recently in the fantastically complicated Don't False Me to Do Stupid Thing to You, in which he received The Contract Killer letter and FBI agents became involved. Here he and his main squeeze Olga try to help an ungrateful pastor reclaim his confiscated church. Lewd's exploits should be assigned reading for aspiring scambaiters. Major style points for:
* deploying an imaginary scammer of his own to make the (real) scammer frantic
* making the (real) scammer lose his temper (warning, some schoolyard profanity toward the end)

Dramatis personae:
 - Distraught pastor whose church has been taken from him by a corrupt government.
 - International Hotel Consultant, always ready to come to the aid of the oppressed.
by mention only:
 -  Pastor's  imaginary Barrister
 - Lewd's friend, East German massage  therapist with a taste for handcuffs
 - Lewd's imaginary barrister, trotted out by Lewd to annoy and frustrate Pastor Emelu


A few bits highlighted for the scam-o-challenged. If it seems complicated, read it out loud, better yet, get a friend and read it back and forth.

Oh my dear friend,
 
i am very happy for your reply to my mail, it shows that i am not alone in this world of hatred and jelousy,it makes me to believe more and more in the God that i serve, and i strongly believe that he will neverforsake menor let me down.

i have forgiven them for the humiliation and embarrasment they brought to me and to my church.

"Behold the days are coming says the lord when i will make a new covenant with the house of the isreal not like the covenant which i made with their fathers,but this is the covenant which i will make with the house of isreal after those days says the lord, i will put my law within them,and i will write it upon their heart and i will be their God and they will be my people for i will forgive the Iniquity and remember the sins no more,i live every thing to God to take control.

My dear friend, i don't know you but you found it a good thing to help my church out of this predicament, for that reason, i pray for you today were ever are right now,God blessings will be your companion in jesus name i pray Amen.

I now live with a member that has been good to me, he his a knight in my church his a very nice man and has the fair of God in him.

what ever your heart fills like giving will be appreciated not only by me but also by God the creator of all things.

Please do very thing in your power to build back the house of salvation and breakthrough, and God will bless you in jesus name i pray AMEN.

REGARDS Sincerely,

PASTOR DAVID EMELU.

messages.body:
Mr. Emelu,
 
I think you have to realize that there is a time to accept this kind of abuse and there is a time to fight it. I believe that your situation calls for a fight. While we are not an agency dedicated to fighting corrupt governments, myself and my staff sometimes take up a fight on behalf of a worthy cause and we feel that your cause is worthy.
 
At least send me the paperwork I requested so that we can determine an effective course of action. If I don't think anything can be done, at that time we'll offer up the other cheek.
 
Sincerely,
Lewis D. Noogie

As men of God I'm sure you all realize that there is a time to put down your plowshares and pick up your swords. messages.body:
Mr. Emelu,
 
I'm sorry to say that I find this somewhat exasperating.
 
No one is talking about violence. I only want is to see if you have any legal recourse in this matter. I'm not going to fight with anyone and I'm not asking you to fight with anyone.
Tell me something - if you build another church, what prevents the government from coming in again and taking the new one? I have talked with my staff and we are all interested in helping you both legally and financially. But we want to feel comfortable that you're not going to just roll over again the next time this happens.
 
Now will you please send me a copy of the eviction papers!
 
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Mr. Emelu,
 
I spoke with my staff here at the hotel this morning and to a person they all want to assist you in any way that they can, including financially. Olga, the East German massage therapist who works here at the hotel has even offered to solicit donations from her former panzer division. However, they, like myself, feel that it is foolish to surrender your land to anyone without a fight.
 
Pastor, I implore you - please send us the eviction paperwork so that we can at least see if there's not some legal recourse that we can help you persue. The longer you wait, the more difficult it will be to challenge the government effectively.
 
Lewis

messages.subject: The lifeline
messages.body:
Dear.............................................
 
The Father and the son have asked me to tell you that your sins have been forgiven and completely blotted out and that you are now a true child of God.
 
They have also asked me to let you know that your name has been written in the lamb's Book of Life in Heaven.
 
I have been told to encourage you to be faithful to jesus to the end, because an in corruptible crown and inheritance is waiting for you in Heaven.
 
Finally, I urge you to be strong in the lord and in his great power.
 
Gos has given us his word, the Bible, so that we can understand him better and grow strong in our faith. If you start reading it regularly, you will quickly discover that the Bible is a life line for you..

messages.body:
Pastor Emelu,
 
Sorry it took me so long to get back to you but things have been very busy the past few days. We had a large influx of American tourists coming here for their 4th of July celebration and you know what a headache American tourists can be. They are always complaining about the accomodations and their habits and capacities at the breakfast buffet can only be described as Shock and Awe.
 
I'm happy to report that we now have pledges of around $6,400 for your legal defense fund, most of it raised by Olga from her old panzer division. As former panzer obergruppenfuhrer, she called in a lot of favors, many from as far away as Argentina and Paraguay where many of her comrades went into, uh, 'retirement'.
 
We anxiously await the copies of the eviction documents that you promised to send. We want to move on this as quickly as possible.
 
Sincerely,
Lewd

messages.body:
Pastor Emelu,
 
I take strong exception to your email, sir. To say, "...if you read this and still insist on seeing papers that means you don't want to help me." is to fly in the face of people who ARE trying to help you. We have gone to a lot of trouble to build a defense fund to help you recover what is rightfully yours and I see now that we have worked to no avial.
Every country has laws and a constitution and even the government must abide by those laws or risk denunciation at the hands of the United Nations. We are here to fight injustice where we find it but we can't fight alone. If the injured party only wants to roll over, there is nothing we can do.
 
We wish you the best of luck with your new church and should the time come when you want to stand up on your hind legs and fight like a man for what is yours, do not hesitate to contact us.
 
Sincerely,
Lewd Noogie

messages.subject: REMAIN BLESSED
messages.body:
Hello Lewis,
 
There was something about daniel which stood him out from amongst his peers, he had an "excellent spirit" in other words, when daniel got involved in anything, the guaranteed end result was excellence. he didn't produce mediocre results in the things he did. now, we know from the scriptures that it was the spirit of God,  that imparted Daniel and made him do excellent things.

therefore since you are born again and have the holy spirit living in you , you ought to function in life even more excellently than Daniel did. As a child of God , you have been anointed unto productivity and excellence,so you should always excel in every thing you do.you have the ability to do excellent things As pastor chris would say,"Don't strive for excellence;do excellent things."walking in excellence and producing excellent result is your nature as a child of God one thing you should do is get more information; improve your skills and trust the Holy spirit to expand your wisdom and intellectual prowess beyond the ordinary level.

christianity isn't a life of mediocrity, for the Holy spirit inspires excellence in all you do, just as he did Daniel. you ought to produce excellence in your job, business or academics because the spirit of excellnec dwells in you. let him express himself through your mind,and actions,and extraordinary success and excellence will be revealed in all you do.
 
PRAYER
Dear father i recognize that christ has been made unto me therfore i walk in "Phronesis" everyday of my life i thank you for filling me with the spirit of wisdom which cause me to speak the right words, do the right thing and be at the right places at the right time.

I yield my spirit, soul and body to the forces of your wisdom to keep moving me and guilding me in the right path you' have ordained for me to walk in jesus'Name, Amen.
 
THANKS,REMAIN BLESSED;
PASTOR DAVID EMELU.

messages.body:
Pastor Emelu,
 
What the hell are you talking about??
 
I am going to try and restrain myself in this, my last correspondence to you.
 
You accuse me of lying to you. Lying about what? That Olga wants to fight for you, to help you reclaim your lost church? That, sir, is not a lie. This is Olga's way of dealing with what she percieves to be injustice. She went to great lengths to raise a large sum of money for your defense and church recovery fund. Short and stout she may be but her heart has all the warmth and compassion of pure lead. You don't even know the woman and yet you accuse me of lying. You have taken arrogance to a new height.
 
The telephone I gave you is for the main switchboard at the front desk of this hotel. I don't answer that phone, the hotel operator does. I should mention that we are in a remote part of Russia and the phones are satellite feed. The reception is frequently poor or nonexistant. There is absolutely nothing I can do about this.


 
I find it incredible that you would insult and accuse of lying someone who has only been interested in helping you. While you sit there wringing your hands and whining about how helpless you are, I have been trying to pick up the banner for what I saw as a just fight and taking on those who wronged you. And this is the thanks I get.
 
Well, I can see when I'm not wanted or needed. You have my apologies for taking your time and you have my word that I won't be bothering you again.
 
L. Noogie

messages.body:
Pastor Emelu,
 
I spoke with Olga again about whether or not she wants to donate the money she raised to building a new church or recovering the old one. I'm sorry but she is still quite adamant about recovering your old church. As I told you before, it's a panzer thing, never losing territory and going to any lengths to recover lost territory. Whataya gonna do?
 
I should also add that she is becoming suspicious of your refusal to allow us to review the eviction documents. She feels that maybe there was no church and that you're only trying to scam money from us. After considerable thought I find myself agreeing with her. Because of your refusal, we have no evidence that there ever was a church. I think your chances of getting her to contribute to a new church would be better if you could convince her that there was an old church. Just my thought.
 
It's pretty much up to you. She has pledges for about $13,000 but she's not gonna budge unless you do a better job of convincing her. My suggestion would be for you to send us the eviction documents so she can at least be assured that you're telling the truth about your old church. Maybe then she can be persuaded to contribute to your new one.
 
Your call.
Lewd

messages.body:
Pastor Emelu,
 
I have good news for you today. Olga sent a copy of your eviction notice to a friend of hers who works for an international law firm in Irkutsk. They informed her that this document would have no legal authority in any country! According to them, eviction notices can only be issued by the owner of the land, to evict a renter for example. Since the Nigerian government was not the owner of the land (you have the documentation to prove that), they cannot evict you.
 
If the government wants to sieze your land, they do it through a process called imminent domain and they have to compensate you for the land at a fair market price. They also have to give you the opportunity to appeal the siezure.
 
So you, my friend, have been boned. You have every legal right to reclaim your land and we're here to help you do it!
 
First of all, do you know any good attorneys there in Lagos? If you do, start lining one up. If you don't know any, I'm sure Olga's friend in Irkutsk can recommend someone. Let me know if you can locate one.
 
We're going to war!
 
Banzai!
Lewd

messages.body:
Pastor Emelu,
 
This is the second time you have called me a liar and now you also refer to me as deceiver 'pagan'. I think it is time that our correspondence be terminated. But before I sever our acquaintance, there are a few things I need to get off my chest.
 
You call yourself a man of god but I see no such person. All you have done is insult people who were trying to help you and this is NOT the act of a holy man. Olga went to a lot of trouble to collect nearly $23,000 to help you recover your church and the thanks she gets is to be called a liar and a pagan. Liar and pagan she may be, my friend, but she bent over backwards to help you in your time of need. I will tell you that she has never bent over backwards for me and, believe me, I've tried to get her to.
 
We are of the firm opinion that you are an individual weak of mind and spirit, unwilling to stand up for his own rights, even with the help of others. Should the government send you an illegal document demanding your new church, you will roll over with your tail between your legs and offer them your jugular. Both Olga and I firmly feel that any assistance in helping you construct something that you would allow to be taken away is a waste of our time and resources. And we are certainly no longer willing to help after the insults that you have heaped upon us.
 
We wish you luck in your meek existence, crawling through life on your knees. Let us know if you ever decide to try standing on your feet.
 
Do Svidanya,
Lewd

Pastor Emelu,
 
I showed the injuction document to Olga, the East German massage therapist here at the hotel. I'm afraid I don't have good news to report.
 
Olga says that document is bogus and she hopes you didn't have to pay any money to get it. She makes the very good point that the document is not signed by a judge or anyone else and there is no official stamp on it. She says that you are being set up and that the government will claim it to be an illegal document when they come to take your new church. I have to admit that I am inclined to agree with her.
 
But all is not lost. Some time ago I received an unrelated email from a barrister Dada in Lagos asking me to help a client of his invest money here in Russia. I responded that I was pretty busy at the time and would not be able to help. Anyhow, I sent him a note this weekend explaining a little about your situation and he wrote back that he would be glad to help. I forwarded your documents and your contact information to him and he tells me that you have an excellent case.
 
He says it is better that you and I correspond directly with him and not with each other to avoid confusion. Lets give him a chance to see what he can do; I'm sure he will be contacting you soon.
 
Lewd

messages.body:
Pastor David,
 
Barrister Dada felt it best that he be the point-of-contact for all aspects of this project, including financial. He rightly points out that he has the most knowledge and experience in these matters there in Lagos. He has fiduciary responsibility for any monetary transactions from now.
 
I did, however, insist that $8,000 be transferred directly to you to begin construction of your new church. He tells me that he has tried numerous times to contact you but that you refuse to answer your telephone or respond to his email. All you have to do is arrange a meeting with him and you will get the initial $8,000. Answering your phone when he calls is the fastest way to make this happen.
 
Just to keep you informed of his progress with your lawsuit, he said that he had to hire another barrister who is a specialist in imminent domain law. We had to wire him the $4,000 reserve to bring the new man on board, which now leaves us without reserves. Olga has pretty much tapped out her old panzer division for funding but fortunately she is also well connected with the Wermacht. She started making calls last night to raise further funding.
 
So you can see that things are progressing well toward the recovery of your church. I will keep you appraised of any further developments.
 
Lewd
 
ps - Olga says for you to keep the faith. She says that she feels wonderful things are going to happen for you.
